sections.heading: period, defined.Entitlement period is ten years, meaning the year after which the required increases in employment and investment were met or exceeded and the next one hundred eight months

sections.text:
77-4916.Entitlement period, defined.

Entitlement period is ten years, meaning the year after which the required increases in employment and investment were met or exceeded and the next one hundred eight months.

SourceLaws 1995, LB 829, ยง 16.
